trans-unit.source: Start Database Copy
trans-unit.target: Start Database Copy

trans-unit.source: Starts a one-time copy or a continuous copy of a specific <token>ssSDS</token>.
trans-unit.target: Starts a one-time copy or a continuous copy of a specific <token>ssSDS</token>.

trans-unit.source: The original database is the 'source' database; the copy is the 'secondary' or 'target' database.
trans-unit.target: The original database is the 'source' database; the copy is the 'secondary' or 'target' database.

trans-unit.source: For a continuous copy, the source and target databases cannot reside on the same server, and the source and target servers must be part of the same subscription.
trans-unit.target: For a continuous copy, the source and target databases cannot reside on the same server, and the source and target servers must be part of the same subscription.

trans-unit.source: When <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is set to <legacyBold>False</legacyBold> it creates a one-time copy of the source database.
trans-unit.target: When <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is set to <legacyBold>False</legacyBold> it creates a one-time copy of the source database.

trans-unit.source: If the request is successful, the copy can still be in progress.
trans-unit.target: If the request is successful, the copy can still be in progress.

trans-unit.source: You can monitor the operation using <link xlink:href="66457fea-f857-48ac-a814-9a90bf34f7c7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Database Copy</link>, <link xlink:href="529a4db0-66ca-45fa-995c-55677ac6f2d5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Database Copies</link>, or <link xlink:href="657358c1-03ae-49e5-92e7-3ea771bdcac0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Database Operation Status</link>.
trans-unit.target: You can monitor the operation using <link xlink:href="66457fea-f857-48ac-a814-9a90bf34f7c7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Database Copy</link>, <link xlink:href="529a4db0-66ca-45fa-995c-55677ac6f2d5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Database Copies</link>, or <link xlink:href="657358c1-03ae-49e5-92e7-3ea771bdcac0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Database Operation Status</link>.

trans-unit.source: When the copy is completed the state is set to ONLINE.
trans-unit.target: When the copy is completed the state is set to ONLINE.

trans-unit.source: When <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is set to <legacyBold>True</legacyBold> it creates a continuous copy of the source database.
trans-unit.target: When <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is set to <legacyBold>True</legacyBold> it creates a continuous copy of the source database.

trans-unit.source: To stop the operation an explicit call to <link xlink:href="9b622ae1-b98f-4c48-be89-5f34a4f65cf6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Stop Database Copy</link> is required.
trans-unit.target: To stop the operation an explicit call to <link xlink:href="9b622ae1-b98f-4c48-be89-5f34a4f65cf6" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Stop Database Copy</link> is required.

trans-unit.source: You can monitor the operation using <link xlink:href="66457fea-f857-48ac-a814-9a90bf34f7c7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Database Copy</link> or <link xlink:href="529a4db0-66ca-45fa-995c-55677ac6f2d5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Database Copies</link> (for the target database) or <link xlink:href="657358c1-03ae-49e5-92e7-3ea771bdcac0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Database Operation Status</link> (for the source database).
trans-unit.target: You can monitor the operation using <link xlink:href="66457fea-f857-48ac-a814-9a90bf34f7c7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Database Copy</link> or <link xlink:href="529a4db0-66ca-45fa-995c-55677ac6f2d5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Database Copies</link> (for the target database) or <link xlink:href="657358c1-03ae-49e5-92e7-3ea771bdcac0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Database Operation Status</link> (for the source database).

trans-unit.source: When the copy is completed the state is set to ONLINE.
trans-unit.target: When the copy is completed the state is set to ONLINE.

trans-unit.source: The continuous copy can be created as an online or offline database.
trans-unit.target: The continuous copy can be created as an online or offline database.

trans-unit.source: The online continuous copy is used to configure <legacyLink xlink:href="e2c0f70a-72a2-4683-bbe9-b318c32a4c54" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Active Geo-Replication for Azure SQL Database</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: The online continuous copy is used to configure <legacyLink xlink:href="e2c0f70a-72a2-4683-bbe9-b318c32a4c54" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Active Geo-Replication for Azure SQL Database</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: The offline continuous copy is used to configure <legacyLink xlink:href="ad013a79-5037-42df-a960-7e9d215c5051" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Standard Geo-Replication for Azure SQL Database</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: The offline continuous copy is used to configure <legacyLink xlink:href="ad013a79-5037-42df-a960-7e9d215c5051" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Standard Geo-Replication for Azure SQL Database</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold>Start Database Copy</legacyBold> request must be specified as follows:
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold>Start Database Copy</legacyBold> request must be specified as follows:

trans-unit.source: Replace <legacyItalic>{subscriptionId}</legacyItalic> with your subscription ID.
trans-unit.target: Replace <legacyItalic>{subscriptionId}</legacyItalic> with your subscription ID.

trans-unit.source: Replace <legacyItalic>{serverName}</legacyItalic> with the name of the source server.
trans-unit.target: Replace <legacyItalic>{serverName}</legacyItalic> with the name of the source server.

trans-unit.source: Replace <legacyItalic>{databaseName}</legacyItalic> with the name of the source database.
trans-unit.target: Replace <legacyItalic>{databaseName}</legacyItalic> with the name of the source database.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: POST
trans-unit.target: POST

trans-unit.source: https://management.core.windows.net:8443/{subscriptionId}/services/sqlservers/servers/{serverName}/databases/{databaseName}/databasecopies
trans-unit.target: https://management.core.windows.net:8443/{subscriptionId}/services/sqlservers/servers/{serverName}/databases/{databaseName}/databasecopies

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to create a copy with the same target database will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: Subsequent calls to create a copy with the same target database will result in an error.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the required and optional request headers:
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the required and optional request headers:

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: x-ms-version
trans-unit.target: x-ms-version

trans-unit.source: <legacyBold>Required</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: <legacyBold>Required</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <legacyBold>2012-03-01</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <legacyBold>2012-03-01</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: x-ms-client-request-id
trans-unit.target: x-ms-client-request-id

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit.
trans-unit.target: Provides a client-generated, opaque value with a 1 KB character limit.

trans-unit.source: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.
trans-unit.target: Using this header is highly recommended for correlating client-side activities with requests received by the server.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body for an online continuous copy is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body for an online continuous copy is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body for an offline continuous copy is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body for an offline continuous copy is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body for a one-time database copy is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body for a one-time database copy is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements in the request body:
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements in the request body:

trans-unit.source: PartnerServer
trans-unit.target: PartnerServer

trans-unit.source: The target server name for the copy.
trans-unit.target: The target server name for the copy.

trans-unit.source: If <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is <legacyBold>True</legacyBold>, the target server must be different than the source server.
trans-unit.target: If <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is <legacyBold>True</legacyBold>, the target server must be different than the source server.

trans-unit.source: If <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is <languageKeyword>False</languageKeyword>, the target server can be the same as the source server.
trans-unit.target: If <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is <languageKeyword>False</languageKeyword>, the target server can be the same as the source server.

trans-unit.source: The target server must be part of the same <token>azure_2</token> subscription as the source server.
trans-unit.target: The target server must be part of the same <token>azure_2</token> subscription as the source server.

trans-unit.source: PartnerDatabase
trans-unit.target: PartnerDatabase

trans-unit.source: The target database name for the copy.
trans-unit.target: The target database name for the copy.

trans-unit.source: If <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is <legacyBold>True</legacyBold>, the target database name must be the same as the source database name.
trans-unit.target: If <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is <legacyBold>True</legacyBold>, the target database name must be the same as the source database name.

trans-unit.source: If <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is <legacyBold>False</legacyBold>, the target database name can be different than the source database name.
trans-unit.target: If <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold> is <legacyBold>False</legacyBold>, the target database name can be different than the source database name.

trans-unit.source: When creating a one-time copy within the same server the target database name must be different than the source database.
trans-unit.target: When creating a one-time copy within the same server the target database name must be different than the source database.

trans-unit.source: IsContinuous
trans-unit.target: IsContinuous

trans-unit.source: When <legacyBold>True</legacyBold> specifies that the copy should be a continuous copy.
trans-unit.target: When <legacyBold>True</legacyBold> specifies that the copy should be a continuous copy.

trans-unit.source: When <legacyBold>False</legacyBold> specifies that the copy should be a one-time copy.
trans-unit.target: When <legacyBold>False</legacyBold> specifies that the copy should be a one-time copy.

trans-unit.source: IsOfflineSecondary
trans-unit.target: IsOfflineSecondary

trans-unit.source: When <legacyBold>False</legacyBold>, specifies that the copy should be the online continuous copy.
trans-unit.target: When <legacyBold>False</legacyBold>, specifies that the copy should be the online continuous copy.

trans-unit.source: This is used to configure <legacyLink xlink:href="e2c0f70a-72a2-4683-bbe9-b318c32a4c54" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Active Geo-Replication for Azure SQL Database</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: This is used to configure <legacyLink xlink:href="e2c0f70a-72a2-4683-bbe9-b318c32a4c54" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Active Geo-Replication for Azure SQL Database</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: This option is valid only when <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold>=<legacyBold>True</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: This option is valid only when <legacyBold>IsContinuous</legacyBold>=<legacyBold>True</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: x-ms-request-id
trans-unit.target: x-ms-request-id

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the database management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the database management service.

trans-unit.source: This request id is used for request tracking.
trans-unit.target: This request id is used for request tracking.

trans-unit.source: If a failure occurs that requires the user to contact <externalLink><linkText>Microsoft Support</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=1782</linkUri></externalLink>, the request id should be provided to Microsoft to assist in tracking and resolving the failure for the request.
